item.title: The Coolest Thing from Insight 2016 and What it Means for Your Job Security
item.description: There’s no denying that NetApp had a slew of shiny new toys to unveil at this year’s Insight conference in Las Vegas. There were the new AFF platforms, all the new functionality and features included in ONTAP 9, and the list goes on. But for me, the coolest thing I saw at Insight was not necessarily demonstrated on stage (although there was a cool presentation on it, which I’ll get into later).
